resp = client.search(
    index="my_locations,my_geoshapes",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": {
                "match_all": {}
            },
            "filter": {
                "geo_distance": {
                    "distance": "200km",
                    "pin.location": {
                        "lat": 40,
                        "lon": -70
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
